summary: Generation Alpha, or Gen Alpha, is the group of people born after Generation Z, starting from the early 2010s to the mid-2020s. They are the first generation born entirely in the 21st century. Most of them are the children of Millennials. Gen Alpha is experiencing a world with less traditional entertainment and more technology, like social media and streaming. The COVID-19 pandemic also affected their early years. Health issues like those linked to screen time are more common in this generation.
title: Generation Alpha
